Sencha Try

Ext.tab.Panel Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.tab.Panel Ext.TabPanel tabpanel tab activeTab plain
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.tab.Panel', {
        width: 300,
        height: 200,
        activeTab: 0,
        plain: true,
        items: [{
            title: 'Tab 1',
            bodyPadding: 10,
            html: 'A simple tab'
        }, {
            title: 'Tab 2',
            html: 'Another one'
        }],
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
